name: soufle.ts
description: Typed bindings and helpers for using the Souffle Datalog Engine

scripts.build-parser: jison src/parser/souffle.jison -o src/parser/souffle_parser_gen.js -m commonjs && cp src/parser/souffle_parser_gen.js dist/parser/souffle_parser_gen.js
scripts.build-expr-parser: jison src/parser/souffle_value.jison -o src/parser/souffle_value_parser_gen.js -m commonjs && cp src/parser/souffle_value_parser_gen.js dist/parser/souffle_value_parser_gen.js
scripts.build-parsers: npm run build-parser && npm run build-expr-parser
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run transpile && npm run build-parsers && chmod u+x dist/bin/cli.js
